title: Bug 133307declare parents implementing generic interface referencing same type
description: Bug 133307declare parents implementing generic interface referencing same type
SR: I have the following construct:public interface TestIF<T extends TestIF {}public class TestClass {}public aspect TestAspect {declare parents: TestClass implements TestIF<TestClass;}The later aspect does not compile, althoughpublic class TestClass implements TestIF<TestClass {}is a valid class.
